Name: Butter Crab
Title: Butter Crab
Desc: The butter-infused crab legs have a rich aroma that washes over the taste buds so seductively that none can resist its allure.\n"Another helping, please!"

Talent.Name: Butter Crab
Talent.Desc: During this Round, all your characters take -2 DMG the next time.\n(A character can consume at most 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food per Round)
